value: What were our total sales in 2024 compared to 2023?

To provide an accurate response, I would need access to your company's sales data for the years 2023 and 2024. Assuming I have such access, I can tell you that our total sales in 2024 were $X million, which represents a Y% increase compared to our total sales of $Z million in 2023.

However, since I don't have direct access to your company's data, it's not possible for me to provide the exact figures. I recommend checking your business intelligence system or contacting someone within your organization who has access to this information.
What were our total sales in 2024 compared to 2023?
❌ Column not found in schema. Not an unknown column error
sql:
SELECT SUM(so.TotalAmount) AS TotalSales_2024, (SELECT SUM(so.TotalAmount) FROM salesorders so WHERE YEAR(so.OrderDate) = 2023) AS TotalSales_2023
FROM salesorders so
WHERE YEAR(so.OrderDate) IN (2023, 2024)
